headline.main: Death of the Patriarch, John Smith.

docs.lead_paragraph: The knell for the departure of one mighty spirit has hardly ceased sounding in our ears, ere we and called upon to announce the departure of another noble spirit, who has laid down a trail body to rest a while and passed behind the veil to shake hands and ?? with his brothers JOLEPH, ASAHEL, and SILAS ; his nephews JOSEPH and HYRUM, and the faithful of all ages.

headline.main: STATEN ISLAND.; Passenger and Emigrant Ships--The Marine Hospital.

docs.lead_paragraph: Scarcely a passenger vessel arriving at this port within the past six weeks has had any sickness on board, with the exception of a few cases of Small. Pox brought from Havre.
docs.snippet: Scarcely a passenger vessel arriving at this port within the past six weeks has had any sickness on board, with the exception of a few cases of Small. Pox brought from Havre.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; Children's Ald Society; CATTLE DRIVING. THE PRIZE ESSAY. ESCAPE FROM SIGN SING. COMMON COUNCIL PROCEEDINGS. Board of Aldermen....THURSDAY, July 13. CITY LITERARY UNION. FREE ACADEMY ??

docs.lead_paragraph: We have received the following: The Children's Aid Society, in order to furnish employment for poor children, have commenced the manufacture of paper bags for grocers and others, which will be furnished at low prices, merely the expense of getting them up.

docs.lead_paragraph: The bark Lapwing has arrived at this port with Rio Janeiro dates to the 5th of June. ROBERT G. SCOTT, American Consul at Rio, came passenger by her. Unusual good health prevailed at Rio.
docs.snippet: The bark Lapwing has arrived at this port with Rio Janeiro dates to the 5th of June. ROBERT G. SCOTT, American Consul at Rio, came passenger by her. Unusual good health prevailed at Rio.

byline.original: Correspondence of the New-York Daily Times

headline.main: THE ADAMANTINE CONVENNTION.; PRELIMINARY CAUCUS AT SYRACUSE. JUDGE BRONSON NON A E? FOR GOVNOR.? HE DECLINES THE NONINATION. The Administration Denounced. THE NEBRASKA BILL ENDORSED.

docs.lead_paragraph: There is a large and rather enthusiastic gathering of the Hards, that promises anything but a fusion at the Fall Election. A Preliminary Caucus was held this evening in the celebrated " Ladies' Parlor" of the Globe Hotel--THOMAS B. MITCHELL, of Schenectady, in the Chair, and G. S. Adams, of Suffolk, E. HOUGLAND and WM. E. McMASTER, of Syracuse, Secretaries.

byline.original: Special Dispatch to the New-York Daily Times

headline.main: LONG-ISLAND.; The Cholera in Brooklyn--The Physicians in Trouble.

docs.lead_paragraph: Coroner HANFORD held five inquests yesterday on persons who died with the Cholera, without medical aid. The verdicts were--MARY NESMITH, Fifth Ward; Mrs. FRANK, Kelsey's Alley; MARY BURT, South-Brooklyn; MARY WILLIAMS, Bush-street..; and PATRICK MURRAY, Hudson avenue.
docs.snippet: Coroner HANFORD held five inquests yesterday on persons who died with the Cholera, without medical aid. The verdicts were--MARY NESMITH, Fifth Ward; Mrs. FRANK, Kelsey's Alley; MARY BURT, South-Brooklyn; MARY WILLIAMS, Bush-street..; and PATRICK...

docs.lead_paragraph: The death of Dr. BIBIGHAUS, of Cholera, was reported to the Board of Health to-day. It was only yesterday that he reported a case of that disease to the Board.
docs.snippet: The death of Dr. BIBIGHAUS, of Cholera, was reported to the Board of Health to-day. It was only yesterday that he reported a case of that disease to the Board.

docs.lead_paragraph: The English carriers and horsemen pigeons are so inseparably connected, that in describing one I must also describe the other. Indeed, I believe the horsemen to be the primitive stock, and that the English carrier is the effect of the high cultivation of the former, those points of excellence which the fancier most highly prizes, being more developed in the carrier.
